profiles.name: Anuj Gosalia
profiles.designation: Co-founder & CEO at Terribly Tiny Tales

posts.heading: A Changing world Order
posts.content: The world is changing at a feverish pace. Friends, colleagues, and everyone engaged in knowledge work are beginning to sense this, including the profound impact of technological advancements and the transformative shifts in our daily lives.

posts.heading: India v/s Australia
posts.content: Think about it - this cricket series was akin to therapy. Laying our childhood trauma up top, working with it slowly and surely over two months, and emerging stronger as a team.

posts.heading: Write to build
posts.content: Writing is the first step to create - stories - products - companies
